<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Mastermind](/NPCs.aspx?ID=960)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Masterminds weave long-ranged plots to see their nefarious goals come to fruition, deftly manipulating those around them, and turning enemies into friends and then pitting them against one another. When competing in a social or intellectual arena, the mastermind is a 7th-level challenge.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Villain_Mastermind.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Mastermind](/NPCs.aspx?ID=960)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 246</row>

**Perception** +10

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +15, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +15, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +15, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +15, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +17, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +11, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +17, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +9, [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +17

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** +4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Versatile Performance** The mastermind can use [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) instead of [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) and instead of [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53). The mastermind can also use an acting Performance instead of [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) to [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=46).

**Items**
[Chain Shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6), [Disguise Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=19), [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) (10 bolts), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +16 

</row>

**HP** 54

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+6 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hand crossbow +13 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 piercing

**Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 22, attack +14
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286)
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [Illusory Object](/Spells.aspx?ID=160) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28), [Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Paranoia](/Spells.aspx?ID=214) (3 slots)

**Bard Composition Spells** DC 22
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Inspire Competence](/Spells.aspx?ID=385), [Inspire Courage](/Spells.aspx?ID=386)

**Scoundrel's Feint**   When the mastermind successfully [Feints](/Actions.aspx?ID=48), the target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against the mastermind's melee attacks until the end of the mastermind's next turn. On a critical success, the target is flat-footed against all melee attacks for that time, not just the mastermind's.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The mastermind deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
